definition: row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense

sentences.english: Did their parents check up on their whereabouts and set curfews?
sentences.chinese: 他們的父母會調查他們的行蹤並實施宵禁嗎？

sentences.english: Danger looming, Mao Buddha who has discovered the whereabouts of Smith.
sentences.chinese: 危險在步步逼近，茅迦人已經發現了史密斯的行蹤。

sentences.english: Her present whereabouts is still nameless.
sentences.chinese: 她目前的行蹤仍然不明。

sentences.english: Occasionally someflamewould come pursuit of her errant swain.
sentences.chinese: 偶爾也有情人追來尋找她行蹤飄忽的情郎。

sentences.english: After a time the enemy was baying across all south Kiangsi, hunting for the elusive Reds.
sentences.chinese: 不久以後，敵人就在贛南到處追逐行蹤不定的紅軍。

sentences.english: The question is whether he is alive or dead. There is no trace of him.
sentences.chinese: 問題是是他是生還是死我們無從得知他的行蹤。

sentences.english: In the end is what leaked Chang's whereabouts?
sentences.chinese: 到底是什麼東西洩露了張錫銘的行蹤？

sentences.english: No clue to his whereabouts has been found.
sentences.chinese: 至今沒有找到有關他行蹤的線索。

sentences.english: Her present whereabouts is still unknown.
sentences.chinese: 她目前的行蹤仍然不明。

sentences.english: For example, how to kill that elusive deer?
sentences.chinese: 例如，如何殺死行蹤迷離的鹿？

sentences.english: Left cold zen have received yue not the cluster to luoyang gold knife the wangs movements.
sentences.chinese: 左冷禪還收到了嶽不羣去洛陽金刀王家的行蹤。

sentences.english: You can't find him, he is a bird of passage.
sentences.chinese: 你打找不到他，他是一行蹤不定的人。

sentences.english: He is wondering of Yeongaryo's whereabout.
A suspicious husband hired a private eye to check on the movements of his wife.
sentences.chinese: 有位多疑的老公僱了個私家偵探，調查老婆的行蹤。

sentences.english: But the chances of seeing these elusive clouds are increasing.
sentences.chinese: 但是觀察這一行蹤不定的雲層的機會正在增加。

sentences.english: His whereabouts are uncertain – he could be living anywhere.

definition: to conceal/to hide (a taboo subject)/to cover up the truth
to seize an opportunity/to take advantage of situation
to accuse/to denounce/to make a complaint against/denunciation
from time to time/now and then/occasionally/frequently

incoming telegram or telephone call/your telegram, telephone call, or message/to send a telegram or make a telephone call here (i.e. to the speaker)/to have instant attraction to sb/to have chemistry with sb/to come back (of electricity, after an outage)
lacking in confidence/diffident/to have a guilty conscience
to declare to be untrue/to deny
